monogr.title: Entangled Confessionalizations? Dialogic Perspectives on the Politics of Piety and Community Building in the Ottoman Empire, 15th–18th Centuries

body.bibl: Ghobrial, John-Paul. “Catholic Confessional Literature in the Christian East? A View from Rome, Diyarbakır, and Mount Lebanon, ca. 1674.” In Entangled Confessionalizations? Dialogic Perspectives on the Politics of Piety and Community Building in the Ottoman Empire, 15th–18th Centuries, edited by Tijana Krstić and Derin Terzioğlu, 383–99. The Modern Muslim World 15. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2022.
